brainly_data.question:
You see an obvious fire hazard with electrical equipment in a part of the building in which you infrequently work. Which option is the best fire prevention practice?


A.
You should not report the hazard as it is not your immediate area.
B.
You should report the hazard as soon as possible.
C.
You should report the hazard at the end of your shift.
brainly_data.subject: Health

all_answers.question:

B.

all_answers.subject: Health
all_answers.text:
THe answer is B 
YOu should report the hazard asap. No matter the case.
hace a blesses day
